Nighlight/Elita::

Nighlight looked in silence that scene, and though infinity of 
things... and she felt alone, she knew that Rodimus loved her, She 
knew that as leader he couldn't spent all day with her... but she 
missed feel him and be a family, someone always was separa them, 
first Hydras now Unicron...
